title: Mobile operators : carrier market shares in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Mobile Carrier, and Market share in each Mobile Carrier on the y axis.
The maximum Market share 28.0 is found at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and the minimum is found at Talk Talk where Mobile Carrier is 1.0.
The highest Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has 27.0 more Market share than the lowest Mobile Carrier Talk Talk.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Mobile Carrier, and Market share in each Mobile Carrier on the y axis.
Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share and Talk Talk has the lowest Market share.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 9 number of Mobile Carriers.
The maximum Market share 28.0 is found at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and the minimum is found at Talk Talk where Mobile Carrier is 1.0.
Mobile Carrier  has the second highest value for Market share.

Market share at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) is 28.0 , second place is  at 28.0, and thirdly is Vodafone at 21.0.
